channel.title: CVE Feed for Zabbix -- Zabbix Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zabbix -- Zabbix Server

item.title: CVE-2017-2824|2024-08-05T14:09:16.849Z -- zabbix -- zabbix%20server
item.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the trapper command functionality of Zabbix Server 2.4.X. A specially crafted set of packets can cause a command injection resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can make requests from an active Zabbix Proxy to trigger this vulnerability.
